params.taskDescription:
The mass of a grain of sand is about <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>6.66</mn>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>10</mn>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
        <mn>4</mn>
      </mrow>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">6.66 \times {10^{ - 4}}</annotation></semantics></math> g. Convert that mass to standard form.
